channel.title: Small Compiling Issue
channel.description:
I keep getting the term. [code=java]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
This is my compile
@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
It's completely set to go straight to javac but it's giving me that error.
Anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Small Compiling Issue
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

The problem is he doesn’t have any java files where the compiler it -.-

Read full topic

Is Gui.java or EGUI.java in the same folder as your compiler?

item.title: Small Compiling Issue
item.dc:creator: @ferasownz12 ferasownz12
item.description:
@ferasownz12 wrote:

I keep getting the term.

javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .

This is my compile

@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

It’s completely set to go straight to javac but it’s giving me that error.

Anyone know how to fix this?

Read full topic
